byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Despite being one of the biggest deals announced this year, Kinder Morgan's takeover of El Paso drew upon only a handful of advisers. One of them, Goldman Sachs, has ties to both companies.
snippet: Despite being one of the biggest deals announced this year, Kinder Morgan's takeover of El Paso drew upon only a handful of advisers. One of them, Goldman Sachs, has ties to both companies.

headline.main: The Advisers Behind Kinder Morgan's Deal for El Paso
